'''''The Lord of the Rings Painting Guide''''' is a magazine-format booklet published in 1979. It describes techniques to paint miniatures produced by Heritage Models.  It also contains information on the recommended use of materials (colors, brushes, etc.) to paint the models presented in the book.  Heritage Models miniatures are based on the work of [[Ralph Bakshi]] in his [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)| animated film]].
